name: Plan 9 From Outer Space: The Game
blurb: Now shinier! Classic arcade action based on "the worst movie of all time", Plan 9 From Outer Space. Raise the dead! Destroy the humans!

rewards.reward: You will receive not only my eternal gratitude (which in some countries may be exchangeable for petty goods and services -- no guarantees), but you will also receive a special heartfelt Thank You on the QuixoteSoft website, including a live link to the website of your choice, be it a Facebook page, a Kickstarter campaign, or anything else you'd like. (NOTE: I do reserve the right to filter inappropriate links at my discretion -- basically, keep it relatively safe for human consumption & we're all good...)

You will receive not only my eternal gratitude and a Spacial Thanks on the QuixoteSoft website (see prior tier), but you will also receive one copy of the full Plan 9 From Outer Space game upon it's completion.

You will receive all lower tier rewards (my eternal gratitude, a special thanks on our website, and a copy of the game when it's ready), as well as a signed/dated 8x10 print of my TypeFace portrait of Ed Wood, created from his own quotations. (please add $3 for orders outside the US)
You will receive all prior tier rewards (see above), and your name will appear in the Special Thanks To: section of the end game credits! (please add $3 for orders outside the US)

You will receive all prior reward tiers (see above), as well as a signed/dated copy of my UFO inspired artwork, You Are Not Alone. (see screenshot in project description) (please add $5 for orders outside the US)

You will receive _most_ of the prior tier rewards... What's different? You will receive all of the aforementioned rewards with the exception that you will get an 11x14 print of Ed Wood (rather than the 8x10 for lower tiers), an 11x14 of my You Are Not Alone. print, and an 11x14 typographical portrait of Bela Lugosi (created from the text of Bram Stoker's Dracula). You'll get access to beta test the game as it's being developed, as well as access to our private forums where you can contribute feedback. You will also receive 2 copies of the game upon it's completion; one for you & one for the friend of your choice. (please add $5 for orders outside the US)

At this level, you will receive... wait for it... my heartfelt gratitude, a special thanks on the Quixote website including a live link to the site of your choice (see above), all of the aforementioned artwork (see above yet again), access to beta test the game as it's being developed, access to our private forums where you can contribute feedback, 4 copies of the game upon it's completion, a copy of my book, TypeFace: Tinsel Town, AND your name will appear as a Producer in the end game credits. (please add $7 for orders outside the US)

Wow! What can I say? You must REALLY like this idea... At this level, you'll receive (deep, deep breath) my heartfelt gratitude, a special thanks on the Quixote website including a live link to the site of your choice (see above), all of the aforementioned artwork (see above yet again), access to beta test the game as it's being developed, access to our private forums where you can contribute feedback, 10 copies of the game upon it's completion, & your name will appear as an Executive Producer in the end game credits. You will also be entitled to any two signed/dated fine art prints from my current collection, a signed, numbered, limited edition copy of my book, TypeFace: Tinsel Town, AND (if you would like) I will base a zombie model on you for my upcoming point-and-click adventure game based on George Romero's 1968 classic horror film, Night of the Living Dead... Oh, and did I mention my eternal gratitude? :)

Geez, what do you want, a kidney? (*rifles around in a luke warm ice-chest*) Hmm, looks like I'm fresh out. Tell you what... How about my eternal gratitude, a special thanks on the QuixoteSoft website (see above), an 11x14 portrait of Ed Wood, an 11x14 portrait of Bela Lugosi, an 11x14 You Are Not Alone. print, your choice of any four other 11x14 fine art prints from my current portfolio (all art is signed/dated), access to beta test the game as it's being developed, access to our private forums where you can contribute feedback, 25 copies of the game for you to distribute as you'd like, your name listed as an Executive Producer in the end game credits, three copies of my book, TypeFace: Tinsel Town (sorry the limited editions are already on another level - forgive me!), I'll create a zombie based on you in my upcoming Night of the Living Dead Game (if you'd like), your name &/or picture will appear somewhere in the Plan 9 From Outer Space game itself, most likely on a sign or billboard (which of course we'll be blowing up... muahahahaha!), and I will create an original one-of-a-kind "deComposition" book for you. There are only four of these "deComposition" books currently in existence. I have one, one was sold, another was stolen (I'm still not sure whether to be mad or flattered by that one), and my favorite one was sent to Helena Bonham Carter when she purchased some of my Alice In Wonderland artwork a couple of years back (thanks Helena!!).

Holy #@$!, I'm flabbergasted!  Congratulations, you've single-handedly funded the entire project in one fell swoop! Thank you!!!! I don't have a first born child (or even a cute pet) to give you, so I suppose we'll have to work it out some other way. Here's what we'll do... You'll receive all the perks as the last tier (see above) with the exception that you'll receive 50 copies of the game (rather than 25), 5 copies of my book (rather than 3), the Ed Wood & Bela Lugosi portraits, a copy of You Are Not Alone., any 6 other fine art prints from my collection, you will be listed in the credits as an Executive Producers (above contributors from lower tiers), you'll have access to beta test the game as it's being developed & access to our private forums where you can contribute feedback, I'll base a zombie in my upcoming Night of the Living Dead game on you (if you'd like), your name and picture will appear in the Plan 9 game somewhere, you'll have my heartfelt and eternal gratitude, you'll receive a special thanks on the QuixoteSoft website, I will create an original one-of-a-kind "deComposition" book for you (see above once more), AND I will hang out and watch the RiffTrax version of Plan 9 From Outer Space with you online / over the phone (I swear it's the best time you'll ever have watching a "bad" movie). Seriously, for a $1000+ contribution, you just let me know if there's anything else you'd like and I'll see what I can do.
